thread.title: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case
thread.title_full: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case

title: New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case
text: > Pennsylvania New lawyer to represent Cosby in Los Angeles sex abuse case FILE - In this Nov. 21, 2014, file photo, comedian Bill Cosby performs at the Maxwell C. King Center for the Performing Arts, in Melbourne, Fla. Cosby is replacing his longtime lawyer in a sex abuse lawsuit filed by a woman claiming she was molested by the comedian in the 1970s when she was 15-years-old. Cosby’s new attorney Christopher Tayback filed a form on Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, reflecting that he was replacing Cosby’s longtime attorney, Martin Singer, on the case. (AP Photo/Phelan M. Ebenhack, File)
